responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "B191F91D47466E829AD665AC3BBDA51B", "We don\'t know. You see, the Horn of Doom is actually the Horn of Thoom, an ancient mino war-priest. It\'s purpose and power are a mystery to us. It could kill us all or only minotaurs. I\'d rather not test it. Nor should you! Let the minotaurs find it and carry it away. They don\'t see it as a weapon, but as a sacred object of a long dead warlord. Will you remember this?")
name: MADD_0005B_HOD_AkhundaWadoo_12
